Login

Add Business Profile Feature without entitlements

item.name: get ProfileFeatures entitlements

exec: entitlement.OperationName = res[i].OperationName;//Parent Operation name tobe extracted
channelEntitlement.OperationName = res[i].OperationName;//Parent Operation name tobe extracted

channelEntitlement.OperationName = childArr[j].OperationName;//Child Operation name tobe extracted for each parent

tests[""+environment['featureName']+" added with entitlements entitled true."] = responseCode.code === 204;

item.name: Add Business Profile Features with entitlements with limits

exec: //tests["profileId and featureId verified"] = jsonData.d.ProfileId === environment['Id'] && jsonData.d.FeatureId === environment['featureId'];

item.name: get ProfileFeatures with children and limits verify

exec: tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" "+parentLimit[k].Period+" is"+parentLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is null"] = parentLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && parentLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === null;

tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" child "+childLimit[k].Period+" is"+childLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is null"] = childLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && childLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === null;
tests["check entitlements with limit for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 200;

item.name: Add Business Profile Features with entitlements with limits on Channel

exec: //tests["profileId and featureId verified"] = jsonData.d.ProfileId === environment['Id'] && jsonData.d.FeatureId === environment['featureId'];
tests["set limits on channel for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 204;

item.name: get ProfileFeatures with children and limits verify on channel

exec: tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" "+parentLimit[k].Period+" is"+parentLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is : "+maxlimitArr[k]] = parentLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && parentLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === maxlimitArr[k];

tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" child "+childLimit[k].Period+" is"+childLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is :"+maxlimitArr[k]] = childLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && childLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === maxlimitArr[k];
tests["check entitlements with limit on channel for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 200;

item.name: Login

exec: tests["Logged in as primaryadmin for iteration : "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 201;

assertions.assertion: Logged in as primaryadmin for iteration : Account Management

exec: entitlement.OperationName = res[i].OperationName;//Parent Operation name tobe extracted

item.name: Add Business Profile Features with entitlements with limits

exec: //tests["profileId and featureId verified"] = jsonData.d.ProfileId === environment['Id'] && jsonData.d.FeatureId === environment['featureId'];

item.name: get ProfileFeatures with children and limits verify

exec: tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" "+parentLimit[k].Period+" is"+parentLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is null"] = parentLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && parentLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === null;

tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" child "+childLimit[k].Period+" is"+childLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is null"] = childLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && childLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === null;
tests["check entitlements with limit for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 200;

check entitlements with limit for Account Management

item.name: Add Business Profile Features with entitlements with limits on Channel

exec: //tests["profileId and featureId verified"] = jsonData.d.ProfileId === environment['Id'] && jsonData.d.FeatureId === environment['featureId'];
tests["set limits on channel for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 204;

assertions.assertion: set limits on channel for Account Management

item.name: get ProfileFeatures with children and limits verify on channel

exec: tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" "+parentLimit[k].Period+" is"+parentLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is : "+maxlimitArr[k]] = parentLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && parentLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === maxlimitArr[k];

tests["Limit for "+environment['featureId']+" child "+childLimit[k].Period+" is"+childLimit[k].Amount+" and MaxLimitValue is :"+maxlimitArr[k]] = childLimit[k].Amount === limitArr[k] && childLimit[k].MaxLimitValue === maxlimitArr[k];
tests["check entitlements with limit on channel for "+environment['featureName']] = responseCode.code === 200;
